name: Atonement
desc: You knowingly or unknowingly aided a monster in the past, this action caused innocents to come to harm. Atone for your sins.
redemption: The cell must protect someone from a quarry.

name: Curiosity
desc: The hunter is driven in the pursuit of knowledge. What, why and how do these monsters exist?
redemption: The cell must uncover new information about a quarry.

name: Envy
desc: Why have monsters been granted such amazing advantages?
redemption: Befriend a quarry or obtain some of its power.

name: Greed
desc: A greedy who Hunter who hunts to take what a monster has. Their ill-gotten gains rightfully belong to you.
redemption: Gain resources from a quarry or similar creatures.

name: Oath
desc: The Hunter has sworn to defeat the creatures of the night, their word is their bond.
redemption: Uphold your oath or bring it closer to completion.

name: Pride
desc: A supernatural encounter has lit a fire of ambition to prove oneself against creatures handed immense power.
redemption: The cell must best the quarry in some form of challenge.

name: Vengeance
desc: Balance the scales, someone close to you was hurt by the supernatural and its up to you to right the wrong.
redemption: The cell must hurt their quarry, directly or indirectly.
